fact: Did you know that J. Robert Oppenheimer, beyond his scientific pursuits, had a deep interest in Eastern philosophy and Sanskrit literature, even learning Sanskrit and reading the Bhagavad Gita in its original language?
didYouKnow: Oppenheimer's knowledge of Sanskrit and Eastern philosophy influenced his worldview, including his reflections on the atomic bomb. He famously quoted the Bhagavad Gita, 'Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds,' after witnessing the Trinity test.
